00013 #define DEFAULT_COLOR "red"

00016 class XVDrawColor {
00017 
00018  protected:
00019 
00020   void getColorName(u_char r, u_char g, u_char b){
00021     sprintf(colorName, "rgb:%.2x/%.2x/%.2x", r, g, b);
00022   };
00023 
00024  public:
00025 
00026   char colorName[50];
00027 
00028   XVDrawColor(char * c)  { 
00029     memset(colorName, 0, 50);
00030     strcpy(colorName, c);
00031   };
00032   
00033 #define _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(_XV_RGB_) \
00034   XVDrawColor(_XV_RGB_ v) { \
00035     getColorName(v.R(), v.G(), v.B()); \
00036   }
00037   
00038   _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(XV_RGB15);
00039   _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(XV_RGB16);
00040   _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(XV_RGB24);
00041   _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(XV_RGBA32);
00042   _CONSTRUCT_FROM_PIXEL_(XV_GLRGBA32);
00043 
00044   operator const string () { return colorName; }
00045 };
00046 
00047 // function defined in XVWindowX.cc
00048 
00049 bool operator < (const XVDrawColor & c1, const XVDrawColor & c2);
00050 bool operator == (const XVDrawColor & c1, const XVDrawColor & c2);
